metadata.title: CVE-2024-4901 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versions startingfrom 16.9 prior to 16.11.5, starting from 17.0 prior to 17.0.3, andstarting from 17.1 prior to 17.1.1, where a stored XSS vulnerability couldbe imported from a project with malicious commit notes.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'not maintainable').
